title: Lunch Menu Recommender
description: Pick your mood and preferences, and get a lunch idea for today.

result.label: Today’s Pick
result.empty: No recommendation yet. Tap the button to get one.
result.count: There are {{count}} options for your filters.

tips.title: Tips
tips.first: Leave filters empty to pick from the full list.
tips.second: If you don’t like it, tap try another.
tips.third: Copy the result to share with friends.

error.noResult: No menu fits your filters. Try fewer filters.

openGraph.title: Lunch Menu Recommender
